summary: An old communist returns to Greece after 32 years in the Soviet Union. However, things aren't the way he had hoped for.
cast: Manos Katrakis|Mairi Hronopoulou|Dionysis Papagiannopoulos|Dora Volanaki|Giulio Brogi|Giorgos Nezos|Athinodoros Prousalis|Mihalis Giannatos|Vasilis Tsaglos|Despoina Geroulanou|Akis Kareglis|Ahilleas Abazis|Eirini Koumarianou|Giannis Fyrios|Tasos Saridis
title: Viaje a Cythera
